cards.name: Mark Of Pain
cards.description:
Unplayable.
When you draw this card, add 2 Injuries to your hand and Exhaust.

cards.name: Mark Of The Bloom
cards.description:
Unplayable.
If transformed or removed from your deck, unless it is a Relicard:Relicard, lose half of your Max HP.

cards.name: Spirit Poop
cards.description:
Unplayable.
At the end of your turn, EVERYONE takes 3 damage.
Exhaustive 2.

cards.name: Darkstone Periapt
cards.description: Gain 5 (7) Block. (Gain 1 additional Block for ALL your Curse cards.)

cards.name: The Boot
cards.description:
Deal 5 (6) damage.
Gain 1 (2) Temporary Strength.

cards.name: Centennial Puzzle
cards.description:
Retain. Unplayable.
The next time you lose HP, Exhaust this.
When Exhausted, draw 2 (3) cards.

cards.name: Chemical X
cards.description:
Gain X (2X)+2 (4) Block.
Deal 1 (2) damage to a random enemy X+2 times.

cards.name: Cracked Core
cards.description:
Deal 6 (9) damage.
Relicard:Overchannel 1 Lightning.

cards.name: Ectoplasm
cards.description:
Apply 6 (8) Poison.
Increase this card's cost by 1 this combat ((up to 2)).

cards.name: Ginger
cards.description:
Gain 6 (8) Block.
Apply 1 (2) Weak.

cards.name: Happy Flower
cards.description:
Grave.
Gain [B].
Draw 1 card.
 (Shuffle a Happy Flower into your discard pile.)
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hovering Kite
cards.description:
Enemy loses 10 (15) HP.
Discard 1 card.
Gain [B].

cards.name: Juzu Bracelet
cards.description:
Relicard:Limitless.
Deal 8 damage.
Randomly deal additional damage up to 8 (16) (26) (38) (52) (68) (86) (106) (128) (152) damage.

cards.name: Kunai
cards.description:
Deal 7 (10) damage.
Draw 1 card.
Gain 1 Temporary Dexterity.

cards.name: Lantern
cards.description:
Innate. Ethereal.
Gain [B].
 (Draw 1 card.)
Exhaust.

cards.name: Mercury Hourglass
cards.description: At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to all enemies.

cards.name: Ninja Scroll
cards.description:
Add 3 Shivs (+) into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Omamori
cards.description:
Gain 8 (10) Block.
The next time (2)  (times) you draw a Curse or Status card, Discard it and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Orange Pellets
cards.description:
Gain 4 (5) Block.
If the last played card is an attack, gain 1 Artifact.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Ring Of The Snake
cards.description:
(Innate.) Ethereal.
Draw 2 cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Self-Forming Clay
cards.description:
Lose 1 HP.
Gain 3 Relicard:Metallicize.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Shovel
cards.description:
(Relicard:Holdover.)
Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.
Upgrade all Relicard:Relicards in your hand this combat.

cards.name: Singing Bowl
cards.description:
Gain 11 (13) Block.
The next time (2)  (times) a card is Exhausted, draw 1 card and gain 2 Temporary_HP.

cards.name: Strawberry
cards.description: Gain 4 (7) Block.

cards.name: Turnip
cards.description:
Deal 8 (10) damage.
Apply 1 (2) Vulnerable.

cards.name: Twisted Funnel
cards.description: Deal 4 (5) damage and apply 3 (4) Poison to all enemies.

cards.name: Akabeko
cards.description:
Gain 8 Vigor.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Anchor
cards.description:
Innate. Ethereal.
Gain 10 Block.
 (Draw 1 card.)
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bag Of Marbles
cards.description:
Apply 1 (2) Vulnerable to all enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Black Star
cards.description: Deal 22 damage. Deal additional damage equal to  (2 times) the number of relics you have.

cards.name: Bloody Idol
cards.description:
Deal 5 (8) damage.
Heal HP and gain gold equal to unblocked damage (up to 10).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Blue Candle
cards.description:
Deal 30 (33) damage.
Shuffle a Pain (Decay) into your draw pile.

cards.name: Brimstone
cards.description:
Gain 2 Ritual.
All enemies gain 1 Ritual (Strength).

cards.name: Bronze Scales
cards.description:
Gain 3 (5) Thorns.
Gain 2 Dexterity.

cards.name: Burning Blood
cards.description:
Deal 3 (8) damage to all enemies.
Heal 6 HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Cauldron
cards.description:
Gain the effect of 1 (2) random potion (potions).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Ceramic Fish
cards.description:
Gain 9 Gold.
Draw 1 card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Charon's Ashes
cards.description: Whenever a card is Exhausted, deal 3 damage to all enemies.

cards.name: Coffee Dripper
cards.description:
Deal 20 damage.
For each two non-upgraded cards in your hand, gain [B].

cards.name: Empty Cage
cards.description:
Exhaust 2 cards.
Draw 1 (2) card (cards).
Exit your stance.

cards.name: Frozen Core
cards.description:
Deal 11 (16) damage.
Relicard:Overchannel 2 Frost.
Exhaust (Exhaustive 2).

cards.name: Frozen Egg
cards.description:
Choose 1 of 3 random upgraded powers to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Frozen Eye
cards.description:
Scry 3 (4).
Relicard:Persist 2.

cards.name: Gold-Plated Cables
cards.description:
Deal 16 (22) damage to all enemies.
Relicard:Overchannel 2 Lightning.

cards.name: Horn Cleat
cards.description:
Gain 14 Block.
Shuffle a Captain's Wheel into your draw pile.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Ice Cream
cards.description:
Retain.
Next turn, gain X (+1) [B] and draw 1 additional card.
Exhaustive 2 (3).

cards.name: Molten Egg
cards.description:
Choose 1 of 3 random upgraded attacks to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Necronomicon
cards.description:
Soulbound.
Deal 9 (13) damage.
Repeat for ALL your Curse cards.

cards.name: Nuclear Battery
cards.description:
Relicard:Overchannel 1 Plasma.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Oddly Smooth Stone
cards.description: Gain 1 Dexterity. (Draw 1 card.)

cards.name: Orichalcum
cards.description:
If you have no Block, gain 6 Block.
Gain 4 (8) Block.

cards.name: Ornamental Fan
cards.description:
Gain 4 Block.
Deal damage equal to your Block to all enemies.

cards.name: Pear
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain 7 (9) Temporary_HP.

cards.name: Pocket Watch
cards.description:
If 3 cards or less were played this turn, draw 3 cards.
 (Draw 1 card.)
Exhaust.

cards.name: Pure Water
cards.description:
Retain.
Reduce all your debuffs by 1 (2).
Enter Calm.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Red Skull
cards.description:
Retain.
If your HP is at or below 50%, gain 3 Strength.
Otherwise, enter Wrath (and draw 1 card).

cards.name: Regal Pillow
cards.description:
Gain Block equal to 30% of your Max HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Runic Pyramid
cards.description:
Deal 18 (24) damage.
Retain your hand this turn.

cards.name: Strange Spoon
cards.description:
(Retain.)
This turn, the next time you play an Exhaust card, shuffle a copy of it into your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sundial
cards.description:
Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile.
Gain [B] [B].
 (Draw 1 card.)
Exhaust.

cards.name: Symbiotic Virus
cards.description:
Relicard: (Holdover.Relicard:)
Overchannel 1 Dark.
Evoke and Channel your next orb.

cards.name: The Specimen
cards.description: Apply 4 (6) Poison for each enemy in combat.

cards.name: Tiny Chest
cards.description:
Draw 2 (3) cards.
Increase this effect by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Toxic Egg
cards.description:
Choose 1 of 3 random upgraded skills to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Tungsten Rod
cards.description:
Deal 5 (10) damage to all enemies.
All enemies lose 1 Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Vajra
cards.description: Gain 1 Strength. (Draw 1 card.)

cards.name: Velvet Choker
cards.description:
Can only be played if less than 6 cards were played this turn.
Stun the target.
End your turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: War Paint
cards.description:
Put 2 random skills from your draw pile to your hand and upgrade them this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Whetstone
cards.description:
Put 2 random attacks from your draw pile to your hand and upgrade them this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Circlet Form
cards.description: Relicard:Relicards cost 0.

cards.name: Cultist Mask
cards.description:
Gain 2X (X) Strength (Ritual).
At the start of your next X turns, lose 1 HP.

cards.name: Dead Branch
cards.description:
Retain.
Until next turn, whenever a card is Exhausted, add a random card to your hand.

cards.name: Dolly's Mirror
cards.description:
This turn, your next card is played twice.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Dream Catcher
cards.description: At the end of ~~- a non-boss  -~~ battle, gain 1 more card reward.

cards.name: Emotion Chip
cards.description:
Evoke your next Orb.
Lose 1 Orb Slot.
If you do, gain 1 Intangible.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Eternal Feather
cards.description:
Gain 2 Relicard:Blur.
For each Relicard:Eternal card played this combat, gain 5 Block.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Face Of Cleric
cards.description:
(Innate.)
Whenever you play a card, gain 1 Temporary_HP.

cards.name: Fossilized Helix
cards.description: Gain 1 Relicard:Buffer.

cards.name: Fusion Hammer
cards.description: For each Upgraded card in your hand, gain 5 (6) Block and deal 5 (6) damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Inserter
cards.description:
(Gain 1 Focus.)
Relicard:Overchannel 2 random non-Dark Orbs.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Lizard Tail
cards.description: The next time you would die, Heal 20% of your Max HP instead. (Draw 1 card.)

cards.name: Mango
cards.description:
Heal 8 (10) HP.
If the last played card is a Relicard:Fruit, gain 2 (3) Max HP.
Purge.

cards.name: Nilry's Codex
cards.description: At the start of your turn, you may choose 1 out of 3 random cards to add into your draw pile.

cards.name: Nloth's Gift
cards.description: Deal 13 damage to a random enemy for ALL your rare cards.

cards.name: Old Coin
cards.description:
Gain 1 random Shop Relic reward.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Pandora's Box
cards.description:
Transform your hand this combat.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Preserved Insect
cards.description:
Retain.
If the enemy has 25% HP or less, set their HP to 0.
When Retained, increase its cost by 1 (up to 5 (3)).

cards.name: Snecko Eye
cards.description:
Snecko.  (Innate.)
Become Confused.
At the start of your turn, draw 2 additional cards.

cards.name: Violet Lotus
cards.description:
(Retain.)
Enter Calm.
Next turn, enter Wrath and draw 1 additional card.

cards.name: White Beast
cards.description: At the end of combat, gain 1 more potion reward.

cards.name: Bottled Flame
cards.description:
Put an (2) Attack (Attacks) from your draw pile into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bottled Lightning
cards.description:
Put a (2) Skill (Skills) from your draw pile into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bottled Tornado
cards.description:
Put a (2) Power (Powers) from your draw pile into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Captain's Wheel
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain 18 (24) Block.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Damaru
cards.description:
Gain 2 (3) Mantra.
Draw 1 additional card next turn.

cards.name: Data Disk
cards.description: Gain 1 Focus. (Draw 1 card.)

cards.name: Gambling Chip
cards.description:
Discard your hand.
Draw that many cards.
 (Draw 1 card.)
Exhaust.

cards.name: Golden Idol
cards.description:
Lose 6 HP.
Shuffle an Injury into your draw pile.
Gain 15 (20) Gold.
Purge.

cards.name: Ink Bottle
cards.description:
Permanently add a copy of Ink Bottle (+) into your deck.
Purge.

cards.name: Nloth's Mask
cards.description:
Retain.
Destroy your rightmost relic.
If you do, deal 100 damage to all enemies.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Shuriken
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to the number of attacks played this turn.
Relicard:Persist 3.
Exhaustive 3 (6).

cards.name: Snecko Skull
cards.description: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, apply 1 Poison.

cards.name: Strike Dummy
cards.description:
EVERYONE
takes 300 (500) damage.

cards.name: Wing Boots
cards.description:
(Innate.)
At the end of your next turn, flee the non-boss combat without losing any rewards.
Relicard:Punishing. Fleeting.

relics.name: Ancient Infuser
relics.description: You can Relicard:Infuse 3 cards with the same name into a relic as a Free Action at Rest Sites.
relics.flavorText: At the beginning of time, it took her three tries to get it right.

relics.name: Replica
relics.description:
The next 2 non-Boss chests you open contain an extra Relic that shares the name of a card in your deck.

Increase the chance of finding an extra Relicard:Eternal card reward from 25% to 50%.
relics.flavorText: Warning: prolonged exposure may lead to existential pondering and eternal self reflection.

relics.name: Eternal Roots
relics.description: Upon pickup, 3 random cards in your deck become Relicard:Eternal.
relics.flavorText: As ancient as the spire itself, these roots have seen it all - the beginning, the end, and that one time you forgot to use your potions.

relics.name: Ancient Egg
relics.description: Whenever you add a Relicard:Relicard into your deck, Upgrade it.
relics.flavorText: It is ancient because no one bothered to get it.

relics.name: Humble Beginnings
relics.description: At the start of combat, choose 1 out of 3 common cards to add into your hand, it costs 0 that turn.
relics.flavorText: A humble box of goods, a humble start to your journey.

relics.name: Reflective Diary
relics.description: Whenever you play 3 Relicard:Relicards, draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: Self-proclaimed reflection of the diary, when it just copy pastes the content of your deck.

relics.name: Cruel Intent
relics.description: The first Relicard played each combat is played twice.
relics.flavorText: Only a matter of time before the second byrd falls to the same stone.

relics.description: At the start of combat, gain 3 random buffs.

relics.name: Apparition
relics.description: Whenever you play 5 cards, gain 1 Intangible. (Up to 3 times per combat)
relics.flavorText: It lives in her colorless walls. Only Relica can hear it.

relics.name: Bite
relics.description: Whenever you lose HP, Heal 3 HP. (Up to 4 times per combat)
relics.flavorText: My shield can protecc.. and smite. But when depleted .. it can bite.

relics.name: Bloody Chalice
relics.description: Gain [B] at the start of your turn. At the start of combat, shuffle 1 Mark Of Pain into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Rel Ica and the Goblet of Blood.

relics.name: Blooming Seed
relics.description: Upon pickup, obtain a unique Curse and 3 relics that share the name of cards in your deck.
relics.flavorText: Legends say, to this day, no one knows how this seed is still alive. God seed.

relics.name: Relic In A Jar
relics.description:
Replaces Replica. Relicard:Infusions now require only 2 cards.
Upon pickup, remove Relicard:Eternal from all cards in your deck.
relics.flavorText: Is the relic in a jar or is the jar in a relic ?

relics.name: Planetarium
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose and add 3 cards to your deck that you already have.
relics.flavorText: Astrology just got an update – no horoscope required : it just shows you what you already believe.

keywords.name: This is displayed in the tooltip.
keywords.description: This is displayed in the tooltip. Spaces should not be used be avoided in NAMES, with the exception of multi-word keywords (see next entry).

keywords.name: X Blur
keywords.description: Block is not removed at the start of your next X turns.

keywords.name: Buffer
keywords.description: Prevent the next time you would lose HP.

keywords.name: Curiosity
keywords.description: Whenever you play a Power, gain 1 Strength.

keywords.name: Eternal
keywords.description: Infusing does not remove this card.

keywords.name: Holdover
keywords.description: Shuffles back into your draw pile after play.

keywords.name: Infuse
keywords.description:
Remove non-curse cards from your deck and gain a relic that shares the name of the cards. Bites and Apparitions included.

Add 2 Spirit Poop to your deck if the gained relic is a Boss Relic or if the removed cards are copies of The Boot or Darkstone Periapt.

keywords.name: Limitless
keywords.description: Can be upgraded any number of times.

keywords.name: Metallicize
keywords.description: Gain Block at the end of your turn.

keywords.name: Multiword Keyword
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.

keywords.name: Overchannel X
keywords.description:
Gain X Orb Slots.
Channel X Orbs.

keywords.name: Persist
keywords.description: Only discards after a certain number of uses each turn.

keywords.name: Punishing
keywords.description: You might not escape the intent of enemies.

keywords.name: Relicard
keywords.description: A card that shares the name of a relic you currently own.

mods.name: Relica
mods.description: All cards are inspired from the relics of the base game !
